EmailTemplate.name: Haiti Projects Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Haiti Projects Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Live Different Volunteers,
We wanted to thank you again for your support in building the school in Haiti!
Some time has past since you were last there, but a lot of progress has been made.
We know that many of you have left a little bit of your heart in Haiti, and are curious about what's going on at the school now. So we put together an update (with some photos too!).
Click on the link below to learn about the new kitchen, classrooms, and more! https://medium.com/@BenjaminCole77/october-ecole-l-union-update-5630feb7e40f#.3xwt9aan3
Interested in visiting Haiti again?
Haiti Public Build - May 2016 http://livedifferent.com/builds/haiti-2016-public-build
Alumni Public Build - July 2016 http://livedifferent.com/builds/alumni-build-2016-haitidr
For some of you, it's been a long time since you've come on a trip with Live Different, while others may have just joined us on a trip this year. Either way, this Alumni trip is a great chance for you and the friends you've made on past trips to return together, to help those in need in a tangible way. This time around, the trip is longer, (a full two weeks!), and you'll be working on building projects in not just one, but two of our destination countries - Dominican Republic and Haiti!
Do you have a friend or family member you want to introduce to Haiti? This year we are offering Alumni volunteers the opportunity to bring a plus one!
Again, we sincerely appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you on a Build in the future!
Thank you,
Live Different Team
